verbose_text: Pyrophosphorylation of the cargo adaptor protein subunit AP3B1 [XREF_BIBR] and the yeast glycolytic transcription factor GCR1 [XREF_BIBR] inhibits interaction with their respective binding partners, whereas we report augmented p150 Glued binding as a consequence of dynein IC pyrophosphorylation, suggesting that this posttranslational modification can influence protein protein interaction in diverse ways.
evidence: Pyrophosphorylation of the cargo adaptor protein subunit AP3B1
